q0.question: What is the present that Nick gives to Fred?
q0.recall: Nick gives Fred one present to take with him when he leaves the North Pole with his $50,000. The statement later reveals that Nick used the money to charter a plane, boat, and sled dogs to get back to the North Pole and help out, so it can be assumed that the present was not related to the plot of the movie. The specific item or nature of the present is not mentioned in the statements.
q0.vectordb: Nick gives Fred a birdhouse as a present to take with him when he leaves the North Pole.
